node.display_long_description:
恋爱与VR之下，众生平等！当你步入王国乱斗的VR竞技场时，你的好友会立刻变为对手！《亚利桑那阳光》开发者精心制作，如今来到了天境的世界，这是动作类即时多人对战游戏，VR专属！

在王国乱斗中，你将收集并升级数十张卡片来创建强大的套牌，并在施展法术、创建军队扫除地图上的敌人时欣赏栩栩如生的卡片特效！加入家族，在常规在线锦标赛中击败来自全世界的对手，并在全球排行榜上夺取你的排名！这不是什么友谊赛，这是真正的战争！

•	游玩数十张卡片来部署军队并施放法术
•	在跨平台的多人游戏中挑战全世界范围内的好友
•	20余种可供选择的竞技场
•	加入家族，为荣耀而战斗，赢得奖励！
•	在全球排行榜上赢取位置
•	在常规锦标赛中赢得威名
•	使用巨龙与火球消灭你的敌人！
•	打赢战争，夺取胜利！

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
- Improved Matchmaking algorithm.
  * Beginner players will be matched with each other.
  * Players with high skill rating will find matches sooner.
- Added Play against AI button in Deck menu.
- Added Credits.
- Memory optimizations.

node.reviewDescription:
If you like any of those games BUY THIS NOW, and I'll tell you why..

I feel like this is what we have here...

The battlefield is almost set up similar to league of legends. There's control points that you can get, and when you take them, the little bots in the sky will shoot at the enemy doing minimal damage. 

But I'm getting ahead of myself. You basically have a number of cards in your hand, you can give them buffs which will give them pluses and minuses to their abilities. More armor, + less attack, that kind of thing.

You can craft new cards. And those will be what you play in your battle. the Yu-Gi-Oh aspect kind of reminds you of watching like the cartoon where when they play the cards the cards actually become alive and fight each other. So you're dropping your knights and your archers on the field of battle, giving them a waypoint, and then they will just walk forward and battle on their own.

You have two towers, and you have your headquarters, and there are pretty much three lanes roughly, just like league of Legends. But it is only one-on-one.

There's ground forces and air forces so you got to kind of battle with what is going to be best, and some troops can really do a lot of damage to other troops and vice versa.  You might have a Marauder that goes in and is wiping out a lot of other troops only to get shot once by a sniper and be dead.

The matches aren't super long, so you can get one in really quick, or you can play a bunch of them in succession.

Right now there's two clans, but I noticed this game doesn't really rise to the top of the charts as far as visibility so you might not even know it's there. But if you see this review do yourself a favor and buy the game, and the more people that buy it, the more PVP that will happen, but for the meantime the AI matches are actually still very fun if you can't find someone to fight against. right now I'm playing mine on very hard and some of those I win and some of those I lose. 

I do think this game is worth it. I'm even willing to be patient and wait out more players to arrive.

DEVELOPERS: If you read this, hopefully there are more cards coming than the list that are there now, there should be contests every month where new cards are released, and people have a chance to win them, otherwise they just go into the pool and people have a chance to buy them later..

You guys should send someone to scout out Horus Heresy Legions on Android and stick around for a couple of months to see how they do things. I think if you copy that model you'll be just fine.

Also, I think there needs to be a global chat feature built into this game. Also a guild chat feature. that's going to get people fired up in the game.

Anyway, see you on the field!
